Interactive Green Skill Dissimilarity

This interactive heatmap shows the green skill dissimilarity between any two occupations, with detailed comparisons of individual green skill differences. Please choose the Job Zone and skill group you’re interested in:

Select a Job Zone and a Feature Group to view the corresponding heatmap:
